context.introduction: Discover simple Mexican salsas and basic dishes! Learn how to combine tortillas, beans, and fresh ingredients for classic flavors.

sections.title: Pico de Gallo: The Simplest Salsa
sections.content: Pico de gallo is a fresh salsa made with diced tomatoes, onions, cilantro, lime, and chiles. It is quick to prepare and full of flavor.

sections.title: Quesadillas & Beans
sections.content: Quesadillas are tortillas filled with cheese and sometimes beans or other ingredients. Beans and tortillas are a staple combination in Mexican homes.

sections.title: Guacamole: The Green Dip
sections.content: Guacamole is made from ripe avocados, lime, onion, cilantro, and chile. Its green color comes from the avocado.

sections.title: Tips for Simple Dishes
listItems: Use fresh ingredients for best flavor
Tortillas can be filled with many ingredients
Beans and cheese are classic fillings
